results.title: [Lisinopril in the monotherapy of patients with essential hypertension: the effect of therapy on glucose and lipid metabolism].
results.text_hl: Twenty @SPECIES_9606 @@@patients@@@ with mild or medium severe @DISEASE_Essential_Hypertension @DISEASE_MESH:D000075222 @@@essential hypertension@@@ were treated with @<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@lisinopril@@@ (@<m>CHEMICAL_Lisinopril</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D017706 @@@Prinivil@@@), 20 or 40 mg resp. by the oral route per day.

citations.NLM: Gajdos M, Spustová V, Dzúrik R. [Lisinopril in the monotherapy of patients with essential hypertension: the effect of therapy on glucose and lipid metabolism]. Cas Lek Cesk. 1993 Dec 6;132(23):709-14. PMID: 8293440
